title: Aerospace and Defense Systems
description: Today’s advanced defense systems in radar, communications, avionics, defense electronics, and much more demand the best in system-level performance and security.

sub_solutions.title: Aerospace and Defense Radar Systems
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices’ incomparable RF and microwave technologies create uncompromising radar systems performance. The high resolution of our ADC/DAC products and the precision of our clock and synthesizer modules, mixers, and filters provide the high signal-to-noise ratio required for detection accuracy and AESA element balance. Our next-generation CMOS and SiGe solutions and advanced sub-systems support increased integration, enabling new system concepts and multi-function aerospace and defense radar systems.

We recognize the need for high-power, high-efficiency amplifiers to support long ranges and reduce the number of amplification stages as well as the size of transmit/receive modules. Advancements in semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Gallium Nitride (GaN), have enabled our amplifier/combiner designs to replace traditional Traveling Wave Tube (TWT) amplifiers, reducing footprint and cooling requirements while increasing reliability in aerospace and defense radar systems.

sub_solutions.title: Radar System Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ comprehensive portfolio of RF, digitizer, and signal processing solutions enable the construction of the highest performance, lowest power radar systems with any architecture and in any frequency band. Covering mechanically steered, analog, digital, and hybrid beamforming systems, we offer components, SiPs, modules, system development platforms, and software to fast track your development effort and accelerate your time to market.

sub_solutions.title: Avionic Systems
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers a broad range of avionics solutions to elevate your next innovations in guidance, navigation, flight control, data acquisition, power distribution, engine control, and motor control systems. Our portfolio includes precision data converters, amplifiers, measurement, RF/microwave, and MEMS products. Our beamformers and T/R modules address AESA weather radar while our large power and BMS portfolios drive industry-leading eVTOL BMS and power solutions.

sub_solutions.title: Air Data, Altitude, Heading Reference Systems (ADAHRS)
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices provides all necessary components to complement precision data converters and provides a complete solution in the form of a µModule® using heterogeneous integration and system in package (SiP) technology. This enables the use of the best process for each stage in the signal chain, improving performance, reducing footprint, speeding time to market, and lowering the total cost of ownership.

sub_solutions.title: Aircraft Communication Systems
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers a comprehensive portfolio of aircraft communications solutions for commercial and military avionics. We support discrete and integrated RF and mmW signal chains for airborne communication applications, from ILS to SATCOM and WAIC, and across all frequencies, from legacy VHF/UHF to V band.ADI RadioVerse® integrated transceivers, a superior SWaP-C starting pointRF amps, T/R switches, step attenuators, and tunable band-pass filtersA full range of high-efficiency power supply solutions to ensure best system performance

sub_solutions.title: eVTOL, Battery Management Systems (BMS), and Power Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Storage batteries are now an important part of commercial avionics, whether they are used as a backup for electronic flight systems, as starting auxiliary power units, or in new eVTOL applications.

sub_solutions.title: Flight Management Systems (FMS) and Engine Control Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices’ flight management and high-temperature engine control solutions ensure the highest accuracy and performance at the lowest power and weight for avionics applications. We provide an unrivaled portfolio for precision ADC in a range of architectures and resolutions from 8-bit to 32-bit, along with a comprehensive suite of tools to simplify designs. Precision linear and power management portfolios support the rest of the signal chain, all within the smallest footprint possible and with a proven track record in tough environments.

Some of our solutions include success approximation ADCs (SARs) and Σ-Δ modulators, isolated ADCs, high-temperature signal processing, precision linear products, power management products, and solenoid drivers and current monitors.

sub_solutions.title: Inflight Entertainment Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Inflight entertainment solutions provide a mix of interactive 4K content to seatback monitors with support for integrated streamed content to and from passengers’ personal entertainment devices (PEDs). Analog Devices’ unique gigabit multimedia serial links (GMSL) and A2B® technologies provide robust, flexible, and cost-effective solutions for next-generation audio and video capabilities from cabin to cockpit. Our advanced displays and infrared (IR)-based gesture sensing and camera-based time-of-flight (ToF) solutions bring the interactive cabin to a new level, and our full range of power and power protection solutions enable in-seat charging systems with the highest efficiency and smallest footprint.

Our industry-leading power control, management, and protection solutions improve efficiency, safety, and the passenger experience.

sub_solutions.title: NextGen Weather Radar (NEXRAD) Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers a full lineup of X-band signal chain components—from the RF front end to integrated data converters—to support modern phased-array weather radar solutions. We provide access to and expertise in a wide range of process technologies to help you maximize performance and minimize SWaP, including  GaN PAs for power efficiency, X-band digitally tunable filters, and active antenna solutions using beamformers, phase shifters, and DSP-enabled digitizers.

sub_solutions.title: Electronic Surveillance and Countermeasures
sub_solutions.description: Electronic surveillance and protection systems help mitigate the impact of interfering emitters. We support technological advances in this area with continuous development of state-of-the-art RF/microwave components, modules, and subsystems.

sub_solutions.title: Electronic Surveillance and Countermeasure Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Effective electronic surveillance measures are critical to monitoring the electromagnetic spectrum and acting appropriately on friendly or hostile devices transmitting or receiving electromagnetic signals. This includes all types of communication, radars, weapons, and devices that are used to locate potential targets using emissions across a wide range of frequencies.

As customer expectations for equipment offering improved and additional capabilities evolve, Analog Devices recognizes the need to address current and next generation requirements. Our extensive antenna-to-bits RF portfolio, high-performance digitizers, industry-leading precision portfolio, and deep domain knowledge all come together to deliver highly integrated solutions. We bring a differentiated level of performance and enable rapid deployment of end equipment for electronic protection, electronic support, and electronic countermeasures.

sub_solutions.title: High Reliability AQEC and COTS Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Whether it’s aerospace qualified electronic components (AQEC) or commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) solutions, Analog Devices is the world’s leading supplier of high reliability semiconductors. We have over 1000 part numbers available including data converters, amplifiers, RF/Microwave and MEMS products. ADI’s broad portfolio of robust and reliable AQEC and COTS products empowers our customers to develop advanced Aerospace and Defense systems that achieve the highest levels of performance while reducing size, weight, power, and development time.

sub_solutions.title: Enhanced Product Listing
sub_solutions.description: Our Enhanced Products Program provides a commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) solution for high reliability applications without the additional costs and challenges of custom designed parts.

sub_solutions.title: Integrated Microwave Assemblies (IMA)
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices can integrate at any level to help you attain optimal performance, SWaP, and reliability. With complete control of the process from the bare die to the manufacturing of key components, we ensure superior product lifecycle management. Our component expertise creates perfectly tailored, highly reliable module solutions for your most challenging design requirements.

Our module designers conduct circuit, electromagnetic, mechanical, thermal, and stress analysis using the same tools as our customers, allowing our modules to be seamlessly imported into customer systems at early stages in the development process. With concept to full manufacturing under one roof, we shorten design cycles and get you to market faster.

sub_solutions.title: Integrated Microwave Assemblies (IMA) Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
As the cadence of electronic threats facing the warfighter continues to rapidly increase, Analog Devices recognizes next-generation electronic solutions to counter these threats must provide wide bandwidth, software-defined performance, higher levels of integration, and processing closer to the antenna.

We utilize our extensive portfolio of integrated circuits, which includes RF components, data converters, and power products, to develop complete RF and digitizer module and subsystem solutions designed for deployment in the harshest military environments.

sub_solutions.title: Military Communication Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Performance requirements are increasing for secure military communications equipment, and Analog Devices is continuously innovating to stay ahead of what’s possible. Our technologies for handheld, man-pack, shipborne, terrestrial, and vehicular radios help solve the toughest industry-specific size, weight, power, performance, and cost challenges.

sub_solutions.title: Tactical Radio Systems
sub_solutions.description: The Analog Devices RadioVerse family of narrow-band and wide-band software-defined radio transceivers provides 30 MHz to 6 GHz frequency coverage and 12 kHz to 40 MHz channel bandwidths—the first of its kind. With families for power management, RF amplifiers, tunable filters, clocks, and PLLs, our tactical radio RF designs offer high-speed ADCs and DACs that enable wide-band capabilities, GaAs and GaN amplifiers for higher power and efficiency in smaller footprints, and PLL, VCO, mixer, filter, and amplifier products for upconversion to X- and K-bands.

sub_solutions.title: Satellite Solutions for Military Communications
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices supports discrete and integrated RF and mmW signal chains for mobile satcom (BGAN and VSAT), ground stations, and airborne applications across all frequencies from legacy VHF/UHF to V band.

sub_solutions.title: Military 5G Solutions
sub_solutions.description: 5G wireless introduces low-latency, ubiquitous, high-speed data connectivity with higher throughput. It also creates interoperability between disparate systems, allowing legacy technology to mesh seamlessly with cutting-edge resources. Together, these capabilities could transform real-time secure command and control, intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR), as well as electronic warfare (EW).

sub_solutions.title: Software Defined Radio (SDR) Solutions for Military Communications
sub_solutions.description: The Analog Devices RadioVerse® family includes agile transceivers that are system-on-chip radio solutions to bring simplicity to the design of robust, high-performance SDRs.Our solutions include ADI RadioVerse transceivers for SDR applications, data converters, power, RF-microwave, and high-performance RF ICs for discrete architectures, rapid prototyping platforms to ease design challenges and decrease time to market, and comprehensive software design tools for evaluation and prototyping.

sub_solutions.title: Missiles and Precision Munitions
sub_solutions.description: As global defense agencies become more reliant on precision weapons, the quality, performance, and design of signal chains are becoming even more mission critical. Analog Devices’ signal chain design excels with:•	Comprehensive experience in missiles and munitions•	The broadest product portfolio in the industry, including MEMS-based gyroscope, accelerometer, and IMU solutions•	The capability to seamlessly integrate hardware, software, and security throughout the entire signal chainOur catalog of components and deep expertise in missile and precision munition subsystems deliver solutions for targeting systems, guidance control, ordnance stabilization, and performance in extreme environments.

sub_solutions.title: Missiles and Precision Munitions Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices is committed to supporting the warfighter. We join with defense industry partners to create modern, high-performance, integrated electronics solutions for the newest generation of missiles and munitions designs, along with upgrades for existing platforms.

sub_solutions.title: mmWave Sensing and Imaging
sub_solutions.description: From airports to shopping malls, there is a growing need for early, accurate, and fast threat detection. Our millimeter wave (mmWave) imaging delivers wide frequency range, fast switching time, scalability for large arrays, and low power consumption for the next generation of walkthrough threat detection.

sub_solutions.title: mmWave Sensing and Imaging Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices’ imaging chipset for walkthrough body scanning delivers a scalable, high-performance, highly integrated solution to quickly and simply move your design from development to prototype to high-volume manufacture.

Our mmWave chipset was created and optimized for use in walkthrough systems. Our chipset achieves wide frequency range, scalability for large arrays, fast switching times, and low power consumption.

sub_solutions.title: Phased Array Technology
sub_solutions.description:
Phased-array technology uses an arrangement of antennas that allows the beam to be aimed in various directions electronically, overcoming the limited speed and reliability problems of a mechanically steered antenna. As a result, it greatly reduces size, weight, and power (SWaP), making it an attractive technology for defense applications such as radar, communications, space, and electronic warfare.

Digital beamforming has gained traction more recently with its ability to support many beams simultaneously, offering a highly flexible system.

sub_solutions.title: Phased Array Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Speed to market, size, and ease of integration are more critical than ever. Analog Devices gives you everything you need to simplify architecture and accelerate design. Having access to the industry’s broadest portfolio enables you to optimize at the semiconductor and integrated subsystem levels and efficiently drive phased-array innovation.

sub_solutions.title: Space Technology
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices has a rich, 50+ year history of delivering robust, space-qualified products and space technology solutions that help innovative companies get to LEO and GEO orbit faster. With QMLV-certified facilities, extensive experience with traditional space products, and end-to-end signal chain capabilities, we can help you achieve new heights in space.

sub_solutions.title: Space Technology Complete Solutions
sub_solutions.description: With more than 50 years of experience in space technology, Analog Devices’ innovations cover the full trajectory of space missions. Our broad portfolio, from traditional to commercial space, helps you optimize your mission cost for the desired level of radiation reliability. We offer highly integrated phased-array, software-defined solutions, and low-voltage high-current power management.

sub_solutions.title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV)
sub_solutions.description: As drone aircraft evolve beyond traditional ISR applications to a combination of ISR and strike capabilities, the potential sub-applications of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV) continue to expand along with the related need for high-accuracy stabilization, navigation, advanced flight control, and faster data communication. Analog Devices offers complete UAV solutions to meet these challenges.

sub_solutions.title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) Systems
sub_solutions.description: UAVs have moved beyond traditional ISR applications to become a centerpiece of next-generation strike aircraft planning. These collaborative aircraft have a need for high-accuracy stabilization, navigation, advanced flight control, fast data link communications, and edge processing to support AI functions. Analog Devices’ complete lineup of inertial navigation, wide-band transceiver, precision data acquisition, RF beamforming, and high-speed digitizer solutions is ready for this transformation.

sub_solutions.title: Government Research and Engineering
sub_solutions.description:
From advanced sensing to flexible edge processing, from components and boards to specially packaged SiPs and system modules, ADI’s transformative signal chain solutions accelerate modernization and warfighter readiness. ADI provides semiconductor and RF subsystem solutions that are trusted, secure, and resilient, enabling government research and engineering centers to meet the stringent quality metrics for the aerospace and defense industry.

From advanced sensing to flexible edge processing, from components and boards to specially packaged SiPs and system modules, ADI’s transformative signal chain solutions accelerate modernization and warfighter readiness. ADI provides semiconductor and RF subsystem solutions that are trusted, secure, and resilient, enabling government research and engineering centers to meet the stringent quality metrics for the aerospace and defense industry.

title: Automotive Solutions
description: By leveraging technologies across automotive electrification, digital cabin, networking and connectivity, our solutions enable safer mobility, and feature rich cabins and more efficient EVs. Our innovations in precision sensing, edge processing, and software and wireless technologies  empower actionable insights at the intelligent edge to transform the vehicle into an intelligence center.

sub_solutions.title: Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) and Safety Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ innovations for ADAS solutions are aimed at enabling efficient and precise operations, reducing design complexity, and accelerating your time to market. We deliver precision sensing, intelligent power management, and high-speed connectivity, which are supportive of sensor fusion and processing from camera, radar, and LIDAR systems.

sub_solutions.title: Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) Camera Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
ADAS cameras transmit vital information about vehicle surroundings to the ADAS processor to inform and deploy vehicle safety systems when necessary.

Analog Devices’ high-performance power and high bandwidth, low latency connectivity solutions ensure that our ADAS cameras deliver the performance and accuracy you can trust.

sub_solutions.title: Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) Sensor Fusion ECU Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
An ECU —also known as an electronic control module (ECM)—is an embedded system within an automobile that controls one or more of the electrical systems, functioning as the vehicle’s brain for automotive sensor fusion domain controllers. This module translates real-world sensor inputs to action, alerting the driver or assisting to alleviate potentially unsafe situations. Analog Devices provides reliable analog ICs that enable the requisite automotive safety integrity levels, up to ASIL-D, for automotive ECMs.

ADAS ECUs support a number of advanced driver assistance systems aimed at further increasing road safety.

sub_solutions.title: Driver and Occupant Monitoring Systems (DMS, OMS)
sub_solutions.description:
DMS and OMS, also referred to as cabin monitoring systems, are critical to combat driving distractions and improve safety within the vehicle. DMS/OMS uses sensors to analyze driver alertness, provide warning to the driver if needed, and  apply the brakes or alternative autonomous vehicle steering.

Cabin monitoring design can be categorized into three key subsystems: processing, camera/sensor, and emitter. The system pairs an infrared 2D global shutter sensor with infrared LEDs/VCSELs to capture high quality images outside the visible light spectrum. A software algorithm layer ties all hardware inputs together to determine various driver and occupant states, such as drowsiness and distraction. Analog Devices offers all of these safety solutions with high integration and optimization to streamline your design needs.

sub_solutions.title: Automotive Display and Lighting Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ solutions for automotive lighting focus on incorporating state-of-the-art switching technology, LED dimming, safety, and smart functionalities to reduce cost and ease design constraints. Our LED driver products eliminate EMI concerns, provide the highest conversion efficiency, and incorporate the most advanced PWM and analog dimming. We achieve this while maintaining design simplicity at the highest integrated circuit reliability standards. Our products and design services reduce customer development efforts and time to market, allowing lighting designers to focus on performance, aesthetics, and the art of automotive lighting.

sub_solutions.title: Automotive Exterior Lighting Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ exterior lighting LED drivers and matrix managers incorporate state-of-the-art switching technology with LED dimming and safety to reduce cost and ease design constraints. Our solutions reduce your development efforts and time to market, allowing lighting designers to focus on performance, aesthetics, and the art of automotive lighting.

sub_solutions.title: Automotive Ethernet Connectivity
sub_solutions.description:
Extending automotive Ethernet connectivity to the edge is a key enabler of in-vehicle networking required for next-generation zonal architectures and software-defined vehicles. Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI’s) solutions extend Ethernet connectivity all the way to the edge nodes and thus eliminate the need for bridging functions, providing a fully optimized automotive Ethernet architecture. Our solutions can be leveraged to enable advanced systems for personalization, autonomy, safety, and electrification applications.

Extending automotive Ethernet connectivity to the edge is a key enabler of in-vehicle networking required for next-generation zonal architectures and software-defined vehicles. Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI’s) solutions extend Ethernet connectivity all the way to the edge nodes and thus eliminate the need for bridging functions, providing a fully optimized automotive Ethernet architecture. Our solutions can be leveraged to enable advanced systems for personalization, autonomy, safety, and electrification applications.

sub_solutions.title: 10BASE-T1S Ethernet to Edge Bus (E2BTM)
sub_solutions.description:
The 10BASE-T1S Ethernet to Edge Bus (E2B) from Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) provides a low complexity, high flexibility edge node implementation for automotive applications. By eliminating the need for microcontrollers at the edge nodes, our Ethernet to Edge Bus solution enables the centralization of all software to help enable next-gen zonal architectures and software-defined vehicles. These solutions are IEEE 802.3™-2022 compliant with support for PLCA.

The 10BASE-T1S Ethernet to Edge Bus (E2B) from Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) provides a low complexity, high flexibility edge node implementation for automotive applications. By eliminating the need for microcontrollers at the edge nodes, our Ethernet to Edge Bus solution enables the centralization of all software to help enable next-gen zonal architectures and software-defined vehicles. These solutions are IEEE 802.3™-2022 compliant with support for PLCA.

sub_solutions.title: 10BASE-T1S MAC-PHY Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
MAC-PHY devices are high-performance Ethernet physical layer (PHY) devices with integrated media access controllers (MAC), ideal for supporting next-generation electrical/electronic (E/E) automotive architectures. Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) offers 10BASE-T1S compliant MAC-PHY solutions that support both point-to-point and multidrop implementations over an unshielded twisted pair (UTP), enabling direct connectivity with a variety of host controllers via the Open Alliance SPI (OASPI) interface.ADI’s 10BASE-T1S MAC-PHY solution is IEEE 802.3™-2022 compliant and compatible with a range of cost-effective microcontrollers. We provide software drivers, evaluation kits, and design and development tools to support integration of MAC-PHY solutions into your next-gen automotive platforms.

MAC-PHY devices are high-performance Ethernet physical layer (PHY) devices with integrated media access controllers (MAC), ideal for supporting next-generation electrical/electronic (E/E) automotive architectures. Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) offers 10BASE-T1S compliant MAC-PHY solutions that support both point-to-point and multidrop implementations over an unshielded twisted pair (UTP), enabling direct connectivity with a variety of host controllers via the Open Alliance SPI (OASPI) interface.

ADI’s 10BASE-T1S MAC-PHY solution is IEEE 802.3™-2022 compliant and compatible with a range of cost-effective microcontrollers. We provide software drivers, evaluation kits, and design and development tools to support integration of MAC-PHY solutions into your next-gen automotive platforms.

sub_solutions.title: Cabin Experience and Infotainment Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ innovations for the automotive cabin enable a more immersive, personalized, and safer mobility experience. Our solutions leverage power management ICs, high-performance DSPs, a broad portfolio for automotive connectivity and networking, audio and video converters, sensing, and application-specific software and development tools. This suite of offerings enables large, high-definition displays, advanced audio and acoustic capabilities, driving safety systems, and more.

sub_solutions.title: Rear Seat Entertainment and Cluster Display Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers a wide range of innovative analog ICs that significantly enhance the performance of automotive infotainment systems and instrument clusters to satisfy growing consumer demand for feature- and functionality-rich automotive cabins. Our automotive display offerings consist of both power and signal chain solutions.

sub_solutions.title: Head-Unit and Cockpit ECU Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Automotive head units and cockpit ECU must continuously evolve to integrate more features and increase performance. Analog Devices’ solutions meet the industry’s demand for rapid innovation and rigorous quality standards.We deliver solutions across a broad portfolio of audio processors, from cost-effective alternatives to the highest performing DSPs, augmented by a wide range of connectivity solutions for cameras, displays, audio, voice and acoustics applications, all tailored for the modern automobile cabin.

sub_solutions.title: Premium Audio Amplifier Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Premium audio amplifiers play an important role in the processing and routing of audio-centric signals to various Class-D amplifiers, subwoofers, and remote tuners in a vehicle. Premium audio amplifiers add extra audio functionality to existing infotainment systems, so designers can service premium vehicle trims without needing to upgrade the performance of the primary head unit.

In this respect, Analog Devices’ SHARC®digital signal processors (DSPs) offer a truly scalable solution with pin compatibility across multiple generations. This allows system architects to select a processor based on the exact performance requirements needed by the audio amplifier for a given vehicle trim.

sub_solutions.title: Telematics, eCall, and Networking Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
The automotive telematics control unit (TCU) provides advanced, connected in-vehicle services, such as networking and automotive audio bus (A2B®) for eCall, while also enabling vehicles to meet new safety and security regulations. In automotive electronic systems, there are many applications that require continuous power, even if there is an interruption in their primary power source and the car is parked (engine not running). Examples include remote keyless entry, security, and personal infotainment systems. For emergency and security reasons, systems such as navigation, GPS location, and eCall functionality must remain turned on, even when the car is not moving. These automotive TCU functions ensure that an external operator can activate control if necessary.

Analog Devices’ solutions support the design of high-performance TCU modules for backup battery charging, DC-to-DC power supply, diagnostics, and input-to-output isolation for enhanced fault tolerance.

sub_solutions.title: Voice and Acoustic Signal Processing Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices understands that an immersive, in-cabin audio experience is one of the primary differentiators in purchasing a car.

From infotainment to hands-free communication, with a person or with a machine—think Siri, Alexa, or OK Google—we have utilized its sophisticated IP to develop ADI LISTN™, a portfolio of high-performance microphone audio signal processing software solutions that fulfill the highest automotive industry standards.

sub_solutions.title: Automotive Display Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers state-of-the-art automotive display solutions to enable you to build innovative and cost-effective display systems. Our direct- and matrix-drive solutions, deliver ASIL-B capability and comprehensive diagnostics for safer and more reliable systems.

sub_solutions.title: Electrification and Powertrain Solutions
sub_solutions.description: At Analog Devices, we collaborate with our customers to redefine how the electric mobility ecosystem can create and deliver incremental value to the electric vehicle (EV) owner. Our breakthrough innovations address EV battery formation and test solutions, battery management systems, alternative powertrain types, functional safety, and various vehicle electrification subsystems.

sub_solutions.title: Automotive Battery Management Systems
sub_solutions.description: A battery management system (BMS) closely monitors and manages the state of charge and state of health of a multicell battery string. For the large, high-voltage battery packs in EVs, accurate monitoring of each individual battery cell and overall pack parameters is critical to achieving maximum usable capacity, while ensuring safe and reliable EV operation. The quality of a BMS directly impacts the miles per charge an EV can deliver. In maximizing the lifetime value of the battery, our solutions help reduce the cost of EV ownership.Analog Devices delivers complete, system level solutions for both wired and wireless BMS, along with software and tools for design and development.

sub_solutions.title: Electric Vehicle Powertrain Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Our solutions for the electric powertrain consist of three main systems: the traction inverter (or e-drive), the on-board charging system (OBC), and the DC-to-DC converter. By leveraging new, wideband gap devices such as silicon carbide (SiC) power switches, Analog Devices’ solutions are enabling higher-range EVs and supporting the OEMs’ ability to satisfy demands with competitive cost structures.

sub_solutions.title: Leading the Intelligent Edge of Vehicle Electrification
sub_solutions.description: A battery management system (BMS) closely monitors and manages the state of charge and state of health of a multicell battery string. For the large, high-voltage battery packs in EVs, accurate monitoring of each individual battery cell and overall pack parameters is critical to achieving maximum usable capacity, while ensuring safe and reliable EV operation. The quality of a BMS directly impacts the miles per charge an EV can deliver. In maximizing the lifetime value of the battery, our solutions help reduce the cost of EV ownership.Analog Devices delivers complete, system level solutions for both wired and wireless BMS, along with software and tools for design and development.

title: Consumer Technology Solutions
description: Analog Devices enhances human sensory experiences by developing innovations that change the way we live, work, and interact.

sub_solutions.title: Hearable and Wearable Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices provides innovative solutions for high-fidelity audio, long battery life, and advanced processing to enhance the user experience for hearable and wearable applications such as TWS earbuds, smartwatches, over-the-ear headphones, and extended reality headwear.

sub_solutions.title: Audio Solutions for Hearables and Wearables
sub_solutions.description: Low-power audio is becoming a popular alternative to power-hungry visual displays on battery-powered devices, such as hearables and wearables. With extensive history and expertise in high-fidelity audio, low-power electronics, and battery management, Analog Devices provides you with the audio solutions you need to embrace this trend.

sub_solutions.title: Power and Battery Management Solutions for Hearables and Wearables
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ battery management technologies support optimal battery health, safety, and longevity for hearable and wearable solutions. Our solutions offer excellent noise performance, improved charging times and safety, smaller total solution sizes, highest power density, and maximum efficiency across the entire load range.

sub_solutions.title: Extended Reality (XR) Solution for Edge Devices
sub_solutions.description:
Extended Reality (XR)* Devices are the gatekeepers between the physical and digital worlds. With one foot in the local network and one foot in the cloud, XR devices at the edge are essential hardware for enabling the next evolution of today’s internet: the metaverse.

The metaverse has the capability to take users beyond 2D browsing, delivering immersive experiences in gaming, healthcare, education, commerce, and industrial applications.* XR is a catch-all term for the different yet related technologies (and Acronyms) which include virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and mixed reality (MR).

* XR is a catch-all term for the different yet related technologies (and Acronyms) which include virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and mixed reality (MR).

sub_solutions.title: Wearable Vital Signs Monitoring Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices provides a range of discrete and integrated signal chain products that are ideal for wearable MCUs and health sensors. Our wearable solutions for vital signs monitoring (VSM) and health offer a range of merits including low power, low noise, and multichannel capabilities. Our solutions provide clinical-grade accuracy in the smallest possible footprint while achieving the lowest possible power consumption. Various power management integrated circuits (PMICs) are available to ensure the longest run time and lifespan for these small, battery-powered devices.

sub_solutions.title: Home Theater and Gaming Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers best-in-class performance for home theater and gaming solutions. The latest HDMI® 2.1 video technology, lowest audio decoder latency on SHARC® processors, deterministic audio, and mature framework provide the best audio performance without artifacts. A wide range of power, Class D amplifiers, audio codecs, sensors, precision converters, and HDMI used in AVRs, soundbars, speakers, AR/VR, gaming consoles, controllers, and accessories bring the real-world experience to your home.

sub_solutions.title: Home Theater and Gaming Audio Video Solutions
sub_solutions.description: The home theater and gaming industry is continuously pushing the envelope for performance. Higher-resolution screens and advanced immersive audio formats require new technology to deliver seamless and enjoyable experiences. Analog Devices provides proven solutions in the home theater and gaming markets with DSPs, audio amplifiers, video capabilities, and power management.

sub_solutions.title: Personal Electronics Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Personal electronics is a large and diverse market that encompasses devices such as smartphones and tablets, hearables and wearables, computers and laptops, and other portable, battery-powered consumer electronics, especially those connected by the Internet of Things.

sub_solutions.title: Personal Electronics Audio Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ audio solutions harness technological breakthroughs that are ideal for micro speaker designs. Learn how Dynamic Speaker Management (DSM) can add a competitive edge to your personal audio products.

sub_solutions.title: Low Power and High Security Solutions for Personal Electronics
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices offers ultralow power microcontroller units (MCUs) that are ideal for IoT and edge devices, with generous embedded memories so you can design smarter, smaller personal electronics without running out of code space or battery life. Our IoT security solutions leverage cutting-edge security innovations to protect the privacy of personal electronics users.

sub_solutions.title: Ultra Low Power (ULP), Space-Saving Power and Battery Management Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Fast charging, longer runtime, and extended battery lifetime have become baseline expectations for personal electronics that run on battery power. Analog Devices innovates power solutions that support safe, reliable, secure, and efficient battery management to maximize the life, health, and longevity of batteries used in personal electronics.

sub_solutions.title: Smart Home Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Smart home is a large and growing market that enables the digitization of the home, making it safer, more enjoyable, and more automated through technologies such as connected appliances, security cameras, and smart everything: locks, doorbells, TV displays, speakers, thermostats, and more.

sub_solutions.title: Ultra Low Power (ULP) MCUs and IoT Security Solutions for Smart Homes
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices’ low power artificial intelligence (AI) microcontroller units (MCUs) combine microcontroller class hardware with low-power AI hardware to allow applications to perform at the level of solutions running on graphics processors. The hardware executes convolutional layers using only microjoules of energy, while the model extracts features and resolves them to make actionable and valuable local decisions.

Our MCUs for the internet of things (IoT) are as smart as they are power efficient, combining the biggest embedded memories in their class with ultralow power technology. Our hardware-based embedded security features leverage physical unclonable functions (PUF) to withstand all known invasive cyberattack methods, with a core set of fixed-function crypto features to simplify implementation.

sub_solutions.title: Low Power (LP), Scalable, High Fidelity Audio Solutions for Smart Homes
sub_solutions.description: Speaker amplifiers from Analog Devices combine superior sonic quality with technological breakthroughs. Our Dynamic Speaker Management™ (DSM) smart amplifiers combine high-performance current and voltage (IV) sense amplifiers with a patented DSM algorithm to create louder and richer sound for micro speakers. Our high quality, low-power audio solutions, along with our expertise in micros speakers, can enable your IoT applications with minimal configuration. Our fully integrated evaluation system allows you to easily and quickly stream music through headsets and speakers and allows you to change gain, filters, and equalization.

sub_solutions.title: Power and Battery Management Solutions for Smart Homes
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices’ battery management technologies enable longer device run times and fast, safe charging for the smart home. Our ModelGauge™ m5 fuel gauge algorithm provides the highest accuracy state-of-charge reporting with no need for battery characterization.

Our USB Type-C chargers offer single-chip solutions with backward compatibility to legacy USB systems. AccuCharge™ technology integrates the fuel gauge into the charger to improve charging accuracy and simplify charge management.

Our power management solutions optimize power and size for internet of things (IoT)-connected devices. Our DC-to-DC converters offer the highest power density, extremely low quiescent current, and the highest efficiency across the entire load range. Options for multi-rail/multiphase outputs and small packaging provide flexible solutions for smart home designs.

sub_solutions.title: Unified Communications (UC) and ProAV
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices has been at the forefront of developing technologies that enable professional-grade, high-quality, high-performance audio and video solutions. Our wide range of products and platforms are industry-standard based, highly integrated with system software and advanced algorithms, and ideal for building highly differentiated products or systems.

sub_solutions.title: Unified Communications (UC) and ProAV Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Conferencing technology is advancing at a rapid pace. The need for high-quality and low-latency performance has never been greater as we find new and better ways to communicate and collaborate on a global scale. Analog Devices continues to push the boundaries of fidelity for professional audio and video products with a portfolio consisting of offerings that cover digital signal processing, power management, video interfacing, and sensing.

title: Data Center Solutions
description: Increases in data center compute performance, storage density, and throughput are driving the need for higher energy efficiency, increased power density, and higher bandwidth low-latency optical connectivity. Analog Devices’ innovative data center solutions are designed to maximize efficiency, density, and reliability. We provide cutting-edge, all-encompassing solutions that include industry-leading power management systems for high-density servers, storage, and networking setups, optical control solutions, sensor solutions for data center infrastructure development, and more. Our offerings cater to data centers of all sizes, spanning from edge to hyperscale, ensuring top-tier performance throughout.

sub_solutions.title: AI Accelerators
sub_solutions.description:
AI accelerators are high-performance, massively parallel deep learning (DL) neural network computation machines that are specifically designed for efficiently processing artificial intelligence (AI) workloads such as machine learning (ML) and DL. AI accelerators play a critical role in delivering the near-instantaneous results that make these applications valuable. As neural network activities like ML and DL are increasingly data-driven, using AI accelerators on standard data center servers can begin to solve this challenge by extracting meaningful patterns from large datasets.

Analog Devices is heavily invested in the AI market and provides a complete portfolio of solutions for both 48 V and 12 V systems. Our complete power product portfolio delivers an end-to-end power solution for currents as low as 2 A and as high as 2000 A. Our data center power solutions—the most competitive in the industry—enable best-in-class efficiency in the smallest form factor.

sub_solutions.title: AI Accelerator Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices has power management solutions for AI accelerators from the data center to the edge, with industry-leading solutions that enable high-performance hardware accelerator design.

sub_solutions.title: Server Equipment
sub_solutions.description:
As server equipment evolves to meet rising workloads from 5G, social networks, media, cloud computing, and emerging artificial intelligence applications, data center managers are looking at operational costs and energy efficiency as opportunities to protect their bottom line. Server equipment must achieve higher power density to deliver the performance demanded by both enterprises and consumers. Annual kilowatt-hour usage can be dramatically reduced by improving power conversion efficiency at each stage of the power distribution architecture.

Analog Devices provides a comprehensive portfolio of leading-edge power products to address the emerging needs of next-generation server equipment, with high-performance and high-reliability power products to meet the most demanding data center applications.

sub_solutions.title: Server Equipment Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ innovation empowers data centers to conquer the constraints of space and energy efficiency, seamlessly navigating the increasing demand for compute power while prioritizing green and sustainable practices.

sub_solutions.title: Optical Networking Solutions
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ optical networking solutions address a wide range of applications in data center, enterprise, and telecom markets. They enable power efficient and small form factor optical modules to support network traffic and bandwidth growth driven by the digital economy, social media, streaming entertainment, gaming, remote healthcare, and many other cloud-based and emerging AI applications.

sub_solutions.title: Data Center Control Solutions for Optical Systems and Modules
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ optical control solutions, including precision integrated controllers, converters, high-voltage convertors, linear amplifiers, and log amps enable our customer’s design of higher data rate, lower power, and smaller optical modules and systems.

sub_solutions.title: Data Center Power Solutions for Optical Systems and Modules
sub_solutions.description: Analog Devices’ optical power solutions, including thermoelectric cooler (TEC) controllers, load switches, POL, regulators, and power micro modules enable customers to design power-efficient and compact optical modules and systems.

title: Energy Solutions
description: Our solutions for energy management, energy storage, and power conversion are helping accelerate the transition to the clean energy grid. By leveraging innovations in precision sensing, signal conversion, isolation, edge processing, and power management technologies, we enable a wide range of applications from renewables to microgrids and commercial grade energy storage to grid infrastructure.

sub_solutions.title: Energy Storage Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Energy storage is an essential enabler of renewable energy generation, providing a stable supply of energy when needed by supplementing the intermittent characteristics of renewable energy sources. Analog Devices’ system-level expertise in energy storage applications is helping improve grid resiliency and energy efficiency, enabling the clean energy ecosystem to expand and transform.

We offer a broad portfolio solution across the residential, commercial, and utility-scale configurations, which includes state-of-the-art battery management systems (BMS) and high-voltage power conversion with isolation based on our proprietary iCoupler technology. Our power management portfolio, which includes discrete controllers, monolithic converters, and modules, helps you achieve an optimal outcome between system performance and cost.

sub_solutions.title: Energy Storage Systems
sub_solutions.description:
Our ESS solutions enable reliably achievable applications such as peak shaving, self-consumption optimization, and backup power in the event of outages.

For battery ESS, our technology-leading Battery Management Systems (BMS) solutions deliver high-accuracy voltage monitoring, current monitoring, and cell balancing utilizing precision multi-cell stack monitors along with either isolated SPI or wireless communication implementations.

In high-voltage, high-power conversion systems, we offer a broad range of digital isolators, isolated transceivers, isolated A/D converters, and isolated gate drivers capable of driving both silicon and Wide Band Gap FETs (Silicon Carbide and GaN) at maximum speed and frequency, thus achieving exceptional efficiency targets.

sub_solutions.title: EV Charging Solutions
sub_solutions.description:
Electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE) supports ubiquitous and reliable AC and DC energy, providing fast and efficient charging to power the electrification of transportation.Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI)’s broad portfolio of EV charging solutions enables platforms that provide accurate energy measurement, efficient power conversion, and secure digital signal processing, propelling the distribution, management, and availability of infrastructure equipment to power the EV evolution.

Electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE) supports ubiquitous and reliable AC and DC energy, providing fast and efficient charging to power the electrification of transportation.

Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI)’s broad portfolio of EV charging solutions enables platforms that provide accurate energy measurement, efficient power conversion, and secure digital signal processing, propelling the distribution, management, and availability of infrastructure equipment to power the EV evolution.

sub_solutions.title: EVSE Systems
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) offers a broad portfolio of devices and technology ideal for both AC and DC electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE) systems. ADI’s solutions enable you to customize the design for cord-set applications at 3.6kW and fixed AC systems for 7kW to 22Kw charging applications.Our portfolio of EVSE-ready solutions includes:Industry-leading metrology solutions that are agnostic to your current sensor of choice (shunt, CTs, or Rogowski coils)Crypto coprocessors that support digital security and open charge point protocol (OCPP) requirementsPrecision and analog functionsInterfaces and communicationsMicrocontrollersHigh-voltage power conversion with isolation based on ADI’s proprietary iCoupler® technology.ADI’s power management portfolio can help you achieve an optimal outcome between system performance and cost in your EVSE, with a wide selection of discrete controllers, regulators, converters and modules to choose from.

ADI’s solutions enable you to customize the design for cord-set applications at 3.6kW and fixed AC systems for 7kW to 22Kw charging applications.Our portfolio of EVSE-ready solutions includes:

ADI’s power management portfolio can help you achieve an optimal outcome between system performance and cost in your EVSE, with a wide selection of discrete controllers, regulators, converters and modules to choose from.

sub_solutions.title: Security Solutions for EVSE
sub_solutions.description:
Analog Devices, Inc. (ADI) offers trusted security solutions for electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE), with support for both AC and DC systems according to open charge point protocol (OCPP) specifications.Data integrity begins at the birthplace of data: within the device itself. Rooting identity in hardware brings your security boundary closer to the data’s origin, resulting in higher confidence in its authenticity and trustworthiness.In tandem with our secure computing capabilities, ADI’s OCPP security solutions for EVSE enable a chain of trust from the edge to the cloud. We are committed to helping our customers deploy connected, smart solutions that elevate their impact in the world, all while keeping data integrity at the core.
